TITLE: City of Sugar Land investigating cyberattack impacting internal network - Click2Houston
SUMMARY:
SUGAR LAND, Texas – The City of Sugar Land announced it is investigating a cyber-incident that has disrupted its internal network infrastructure, according to a statement released by city officials.

The city said the Sugar Land Police Department is working with local, state and federal law enforcement agencies as part of the investigation.
